 27 	/**
 28 	 * @private
 29 	 * @function
 30 	 * @description Cache dom elements which are being accessed multiple times.<br/>app.ui holds globally available elements.
 31 	 */
 32 	function initUiCache() {
 33 		app.ui = {
 34 			searchContainer : $("#navigation .header-search"),
 35 			printPage		: $("a.print-page"),
 36 			reviewsContainer: $("#pwrwritediv"),
 37 			main			: $("#main"),
 38 			primary			: $("#primary"),
 39 			secondary		: $("#secondary"),
 40 			// elements found in content slots
 41 			slots : {
 42 				subscribeEmail : $(".subscribe-email")
 43 			}
 44 		};
 45 	}
 46 	
 47 	/**
 48 	 * @private
 49 	 * @function
 50 	 * @description Apply dialogify event handler to all elements that match one or more of the specified selectors.
 51 	 */
 52 	function initializeEvents() {
 53 		var controlKeys = ["8", "13", "46", "45", "36", "35", "38", "37", "40", "39"];
 54 
 55 		$("body").on("click", ".dialogify, [data-dlg-options], [data-dlg-action]", app.util.setDialogify)
 56 		.on("keydown", "textarea[data-character-limit]", function(e) {
 57 			var text = $.trim($(this).val()),
 58 				charsLimit = $(this).data("character-limit"),
 59 				charsUsed = text.length;
 60 
 61 				if ((charsUsed >= charsLimit) && (controlKeys.indexOf(e.which.toString()) < 0)) {
 62 					e.preventDefault();
 63 				}
 64 		})
 65 		.on("change keyup mouseup", "textarea[data-character-limit]", function(e) {
 66 			var text = $.trim($(this).val()),
 67 				charsLimit = $(this).data("character-limit"),
 68 				charsUsed = text.length,
 69 				charsRemain = charsLimit - charsUsed;
 70 
 71 			if(charsRemain < 0) {
 72 				$(this).val( text.slice(0, charsRemain) );
 73 				charsRemain = 0;
 74 			}
 75 
 76 			$(this).next('div.char-count').find('.char-remain-count').html(charsRemain);
 77 		});
 78 
 79 
 80 		//initialize search suggestions
 81 		app.searchsuggest.init(app.ui.searchContainer, app.resources.SIMPLE_SEARCH);
 82 
 83 		// print handler
 84 		app.ui.printPage.on("click", function () { window.print(); return false; });
 85 
 86 
 87 		// add show/hide navigation elements
 88 		$('.secondary-navigation .toggle').click(function(){
 89 			$(this).toggleClass('expanded').next('ul').toggle();
 90 		});
 91 
 92 		// add generic toggle functionality
 93 		$('.toggle').next('.toggle-content').hide();
 94 		$('.toggle').click(function(){
 95 			$(this).toggleClass('expanded').next('.toggle-content').toggle();
 96 		});
 97 
 98 		// subscribe email box
 99 		if (app.ui.slots.subscribeEmail.length > 0)	{
100 			app.ui.slots.subscribeEmail.focus(function () {
101 				var val = $(this.val());
102 				if(val.length > 0 && val !== app.resources.SUBSCRIBE_EMAIL_DEFAULT) {
103 					return; // do not animate when contains non-default value
104 				}
105 
106 				$(this).animate({ color: '#999999'}, 500, 'linear', function () {
107 					$(this).val('').css('color','#333333');
108 				});
109 			}).blur(function () {
110 				var val = $.trim($(this.val()));
111 				if(val.length > 0) {
112 					return; // do not animate when contains value
113 				}
114 
115 				$(this).val(app.resources.SUBSCRIBE_EMAIL_DEFAULT)
116 					   .css('color','#999999')
117 					   .animate({color: '#333333'}, 500, 'linear');
118 
119 			});
120 		}
121 	}
122 	/**
123 	 * @private
124 	 * @function
125 	 * @description Adds class ('js') to html for css targeting and loads js specific styles.
126 	 */
127 	function initializeDom() {
128 		// add class to html for css targeting
129 		$('html').addClass('js');
130 
131 		// load js specific styles
132 		app.util.limitCharacters();
133 	}

172 			app.searchplaceholder.init();

174 			var ns = app.page.ns;
175 			if (ns && app[ns] && app[ns].init) {
176 				app[ns].init();
177 			}
178 		}
179 	};
180 
181 	return $.extend(app, _app);

184 /**
185 @class app.storefront
186 */
187 (function (app, $) {
188 	var $cache = {};
189 	app.storefront = {
190 		init : function () {
191 			$cache = {
192 				slide : $('.slide'),
193 				slider : $('#homepage-slider'),
194 				wrapper : $('#wrapper')
195 			};
196 
197 			/**
198 			 * @function
199 			 * @description Triggers the scroll event on a carousel element
200 			 * @param {Object} carousel
201 			 */
202 			function slideCarousel_initCallback(carousel) {
203 
204 				// create navigation for slideshow
205 				var numSlides = $('#homepage-slider li').size();
206 				var slideShowNav = '<div class="jcarousel-control">';
207 				for( i=1; i <= numSlides; i++) {
208 					slideShowNav = slideShowNav + '<a href="#" class="link-'+i+'">' + i + '</a>';
209 				}
210 				slideShowNav = slideShowNav + '</div>';
211 				$('#homepage-slider .jcarousel-clip').append(slideShowNav);
212 
213 			   $('.jcarousel-control a').bind('click', function() {
214 			        carousel.scroll(jQuery.jcarousel.intval($(this).text()));
215 			        return false;
216 			    });
217 
218 			   $cache.slide.width($cache.wrapper.width());
219 
220 			}
221 			/**
222 			 * @function
223 			 * @description Activates the visibility of the next element in the carousel 
224 			 * @param {Object} carousel -- necessity needs TBD!
225 			 * @param {Object} item --  necessity needs TBD!
226 			 * @param {Number} idx Index of the item which should be activated
227 			 * @param {Object} state --  necessity needs TBD!
228 			 */
229 			function slideCarousel_itemVisible(carousel, item, idx, state) {
230 			    //alert('Item #' + idx + ' is visible');
231 				$('.jcarousel-control a').removeClass('active');
232 				$('.jcarousel-control').find('.link-'+idx).addClass('active');
233 			}
234 
235 			$cache.slider.jcarousel({
236 				scroll: 1,
237 				auto: 4,
238 				buttonNextHTML: null,
239 				buttonPrevHTML: null,
240 				itemFallbackDimension: '100%',
241 				initCallback: slideCarousel_initCallback,
242 				itemFirstInCallback: slideCarousel_itemVisible
243 			});
244 		}
245 	};
246 
247 }(window.app = window.app || {}, jQuery));

250 /**
251 @class app.tooltip
252 */
253 (function (app, $) {
254 	var $cache = {};
255 	app.tooltips = {
256 		/**
257 		 * @function
258 		 * @description Initializes the tooltip-content and layout
259 		 */	
260 		init : function () {
261 
262 			$('.tooltip').tooltip({
263 				track: true,
264 				showURL: false,
265 			    bodyHandler: function() {
266 					// add a data attribute of data-layout="some-class" to your tooltip-content container if you want a custom class
267 					var tooltipClass = "";
268 					if( tooltipClass = $(this).find('.tooltip-content').data("layout") ) {
269 						tooltipClass = " class='" + tooltipClass + "' ";
270 					}
271 		        	return "<div " + tooltipClass + ">" + $(this).find('.tooltip-content').html() + "</div>";
272 				},
273 				showURL: false
274 			});
275 		}
276 	};
277

284 (function (app, $) {

289 	/**
290 	 * @private
291 	 * @function
292 	 * @description Loads product's navigation on the product detail page
293 	 */
294 	function loadProductNavigation() {
295 		var pidInput = $cache.pdpForm.find("input[name='pid']").last();
296 		var navContainer = $("#product-nav-container");
297 		// if no hash exists, or no pid exists, or nav container does not exist, return
298 		if (window.location.hash.length <= 1 || pidInput.length===0 || navContainer.length===0) {
299 			return;
300 		}
301 
302 		var pid = pidInput.val();
303 		var hashParams = window.location.hash.substr(1);
304 		if (hashParams.indexOf("pid="+pid) < 0) {
305 			hashParams+="&pid="+pid;
306 		}
307 
308 		var url = app.urls.productNav+(app.urls.productNav.indexOf("?") < 0 ? "?" : "&")+hashParams;
309 		app.ajax.load({url:url, target: navContainer});
310 	}
311 
312 	/**
313 	 * @private
314 	 * @function
315 	 * @description Creates product recommendation carousel using jQuery jcarousel plugin
316 	 */
317 	function loadRecommendations() {
318 		var carousel = $("#carousel-recomendations");
319 		if(!carousel || carousel.length === 0 || carousel.children().length === 0) {
320 			return;
321 		}
322 
323 		carousel.jcarousel(app.components.carouselSettings);
324 	}
325 
326 	/**
327 	 * @function
328 	 * @description Sets the main image attributes and the href for the surrounding <a> tag
329 	 * @param {Object} atts Simple object with url, alt, title and hires properties
330 	 */
331 	function setMainImage(atts) {
332 		var imgZoom = $cache.pdpMain.find("a.main-image");
333 		if (imgZoom.length>0 && atts.hires && atts.hires!='' && atts.hires!='null') {
334 			imgZoom.attr("href", atts.hires);
335 		}
336 
337 		imgZoom.find("img.primary-image").attr({
338 			"src" : atts.url,
339 			"alt" : atts.alt,
340 			"title" : atts.title
341 		});
342 	}
343 
344 	/**
345 	 * @function
346 	 * @description helper function for swapping main image on swatch hover
347 	 * @param {Element} element DOM element with custom data-lgimg attribute
348 	 */
349 	function swapImage(element) {
350 		var lgImg = $(element).data("lgimg");
351 
352 		var newImg = $.extend({}, lgImg);
353 		var imgZoom = $cache.pdpMain.find("a.main-image");
354 		var mainImage = imgZoom.find("img.primary-image");
355 		// store current image info
356 		lgImg.hires = imgZoom.attr("href");
357 		lgImg.url = mainImage.attr("src");
358 		lgImg.alt = mainImage.attr("alt");
359 		lgImg.title = mainImage.attr("title");
360 		// reset element's lgimg data attribute
361 		$(element).data(lgImg);
362 		// set the main image
363 		setMainImage(newImg);
364 	}
365 
366 
367 	/**
368 	 * @function
369 	 * @description Enables the zoom viewer on the product detail page
370 	 */
371 	function loadZoom() {
372 		if(app.quickView.isActive() || !app.zoomViewerEnabled) { return; }
373 
374 		//zoom properties
375 		var options = {
376 			zoomType: 'standard',
377 			alwaysOn : 0, // setting to 1 will load load high res images on page load
378 			zoomWidth : 575,
379 			zoomHeight : 349,
380 			position:'right',
381 			preloadImages: 0, // setting to 1 will load load high res images on page load
382 			xOffset: 30,
383 			yOffset:0,
384 			showEffect : 'fadein',
385 			hideEffect: 'fadeout'
386 		};
387 
388 		// Added to prevent empty hires zoom feature (if images don't exist)
389 		var mainImage = $cache.pdpMain.find("a.main-image");
390 		var hiresImageSrc = mainImage.attr("href");
391 		if( hiresImageSrc && hiresImageSrc != '' && hiresImageSrc.indexOf('noimagelarge')<0 ) {
392 			mainImage.removeData("jqzoom").jqzoom(options);
393 		}
394 	}
395 	/**
396 	 * @function
397 	 * @description replaces the images in the image container. for example when a different color was clicked. 
398 	 */
399 	function replaceImages() {
400 		var newImages = $("#update-images");
401 		var imageContainer = $cache.pdpMain.find("div.product-image-container");
402 
403 		imageContainer.html(newImages.html());
404 		newImages.remove();
405 		setMainImageLink();
406 
407 		loadZoom();
408 	}
409 	/**
410 	 * @function
411 	 * @description Adds css class (image-zoom) to the main product image in order to activate the zoom viewer on the product detail page.
412 	 */
413 	function setMainImageLink() {
414 		if (app.quickView.isActive() || app.isMobileUserAgent) {
415 			$cache.pdpMain.find("a.main-image").removeAttr("href");
416 		}
417 		else {
418 			$cache.pdpMain.find("a.main-image").addClass("image-zoom");
419 		}
420 	}
421 	/**
422 	 * @function
423 	 * @description Removes css class (image-zoom) from the main product image in order to deactivate the zoom viewer on the product detail page.
424 	 */
425 	function removeImageZoom() {
426 		$cache.pdpMain.find("a.main-image").removeClass("image-zoom");
427 	}

429 	/**
430 	 * @private
431 	 * @function
432 	 * @description Initializes the DOM of the product detail page (images, reviews, recommendation and product-navigation).
433 	 */
434 	function initializeDom() {
435 		$cache.pdpMain.find('div.product-detail .product-tabs').tabs();
436 		if($('#pwrwritediv').length > 0) {
437 			var options = $.extend(true, {}, app.dialog.settings, {
438 				autoOpen : true,
439 				height : 750,
440 				width : 650,
441 				dialogClass : 'writereview',
442 				title : 'Product Review',
443 				resizable : false
444 			});
445 
446 			app.dialog.create({
447 				target : app.ui.reviewsContainer,
448 				options : options
449 			});
450 		}
451 
452 		loadRecommendations($cache.container);
453 		loadProductNavigation();
454 		setMainImageLink();
455 
456 		if ($cache.productSetList.length>0) {
457 			var unavailable = $cache.productSetList.find("form").find("button.add-to-cart[disabled]");
458 			if (unavailable.length > 0) {
459 				$cache.addAllToCart.attr("disabled", "disabled");
460 				$cache.addToCart.attr("disabled", "disabled"); // this may be a bundle
461 
462 			}
463 		}
464 
465 		app.tooltips.init();
466 	}
467 	/**
468 	 * @private
469 	 * @function
470 	 * @description Initializes the cache on the product detail page.
471 	 */
472 	function initializeCache() {
473 		$cache = {
474 			productId : $("#pid"),
475 			pdpMain : $("#pdpMain"),
476 			productContent : $("#product-content"),
477 			thumbnails : $("#thumbnails"),
478 			bonusProductGrid : $(".bonusproductgrid"),
479 			imageContainer : $(".product-primary-image"),
480 			productSetList : $("#product-set-list"),
481 			addToCart : $("#add-to-cart"),
482 			addAllToCart : $("#add-all-to-cart")
483 		};
484 		$cache.detailContent = $cache.pdpMain.find("div.detail-content");
485 		$cache.pdpForm = $cache.pdpMain.find("form.pdpForm");
486 		$cache.swatches = $cache.pdpMain.find("ul.swatches");
487 		$cache.mainImageAnchor = $cache.imageZoom = $cache.imageContainer.find("a.main-image");
488 		$cache.mainImage = $cache.mainImageAnchor.find("img.primary-image");
489 	}

491 	/**
492 	 * @private
493 	 * @function
494 	 * @description Initializes events on the product detail page for the following elements:<br/>
495 	 * <p>availability message</p>
496 	 * <p>add to cart functionality</p>
497 	 * <p>images and swatches</p>
498 	 * <p>variation selection</p>
499 	 * <p>option selection</p>
500 	 * <p>send to friend functionality</p>
501 	 */
502 	function initializeEvents() {
503 
504 		app.product.initAddThis();
505 
506 		// add or update shopping cart line item
507 		app.product.initAddToCart();
508 		$cache.pdpMain.on("change keyup", "form.pdpForm input[name='Quantity']", function (e) {
509 			var availabilityContainer = $cache.pdpMain.find("div.availability");
510 			app.product.getAvailability(
511 				$("#pid").val(),
512 				$(this).val(),
513 				function (data) {
514 					if (!data) {
515 						$cache.addToCart.removeAttr("disabled");
516 						availabilityContainer.find(".availability-qty-available").html();
517 						availabilityContainer.find(".availability-msg").show();
518 						return;
519 					}else{
520 						var avMsg = null;
521 						var avRoot = availabilityContainer.find(".availability-msg").html('');
522 
523 						// Look through levels ... if msg is not empty, then create span el
524 						if( data.levels.IN_STOCK> 0 ) {
525 							avMsg = avRoot.find(".in-stock-msg");
526 							if (avMsg.length===0) {
527 								avMsg = $("<p/>").addClass("in-stock-msg").appendTo(avRoot);
528 							}
529 							if( data.levels.PREORDER==0 && data.levels.BACKORDER==0 && data.levels.NOT_AVAILABLE==0 ) {
530 								// Just in stock
531 								avMsg.text(app.resources.IN_STOCK);
532 							} else {
533 								// In stock with conditions ...
534 								avMsg.text(data.inStockMsg);
535 							}
536 						}
537 						if( data.levels.PREORDER> 0 ) {
538 							avMsg = avRoot.find(".preorder-msg");
539 							if (avMsg.length===0) {
540 								avMsg = $("<p/>").addClass("preorder-msg").appendTo(avRoot);
541 							}
542 							if( data.levels.IN_STOCK==0 && data.levels.BACKORDER==0 && data.levels.NOT_AVAILABLE==0 ) {
543 								// Just in stock
544 								avMsg.text(app.resources.PREORDER);
545 							} else {
546 								avMsg.text(data.preOrderMsg);
547 							}
548 						}
549 						if( data.levels.BACKORDER> 0 ) {
550 							avMsg = avRoot.find(".backorder-msg");
551 							if (avMsg.length===0) {
552 								avMsg = $("<p/>").addClass("backorder-msg").appendTo(avRoot);
553 							}
554 							if( data.levels.IN_STOCK==0 && data.levels.PREORDER==0 && data.levels.NOT_AVAILABLE==0 ) {
555 								// Just in stock
556 								avMsg.text(app.resources.BACKORDER);
557 							} else {
558 								avMsg.text(data.backOrderMsg);
559 							}
560 						}
561 						if( data.inStockDate != '' ) {
562 							avMsg = avRoot.find(".in-stock-date-msg");
563 							if (avMsg.length===0) {
564 								avMsg = $("<p/>").addClass("in-stock-date-msg").appendTo(avRoot);
565 							}
566 							avMsg.text(String.format(app.resources.IN_STOCK_DATE,data.inStockDate));
567 						}
568 						if( data.levels.NOT_AVAILABLE> 0 ) {
569 							avMsg = avRoot.find(".not-available-msg");
570 							if (avMsg.length===0) {
571 								avMsg = $("<p/>").addClass("not-available-msg").appendTo(avRoot);
572 							}
573 							if( data.levels.PREORDER==0 && data.levels.BACKORDER==0 && data.levels.IN_STOCK==0 ) {
574 								avMsg.text(app.resources.NOT_AVAILABLE);
575 							} else {
576 								avMsg.text(app.resources.REMAIN_NOT_AVAILABLE);
577 							}
578 						}
579 						return;
580 					}
581 					$cache.addToCart.attr("disabled", "disabled");
582 					availabilityContainer.find(".availability-msg").hide();
583 					var avQtyMsg = availabilityContainer.find(".availability-qty-available");
584 					if (avQtyMsg.length===0) {
585 						avQtyMsg = $("<span/>").addClass("availability-qty-available").appendTo(availabilityContainer);
586 					}
587 					avQtyMsg.text(data.inStockMsg).show();
588 
589 					var avQtyMsg = availabilityContainer.find(".availability-qty-available");
590 					if (avQtyMsg.length===0) {
591 						avQtyMsg = $("<span/>").addClass("availability-qty-available").appendTo(availabilityContainer);
592 					}
593 					avQtyMsg.text(data.backorderMsg).show();
594 				});
595 
596 		});
597 
598 		// Add to Wishlist and Add to Gift Registry links behaviors
599 		$cache.pdpMain.on("click", "a.wl-action", function (e) {
600 			e.preventDefault();
601 
602 			var data = app.util.getQueryStringParams($("form.pdpForm").serialize());
603 			if (data.cartAction) {
604 				delete data.cartAction;
605 			}
606 			var url = app.util.appendParamsToUrl(this.href, data);
607 			url = this.protocol + "//" + this.hostname + ((url.charAt(0)==="/") ? url : ("/"+url));
608 			window.location.href = url;
609 		});
610 
611 		$cache.pdpMain.on("hover", "ul.Color a.swatchanchor", function () {
612 			swapImage(this);
613 		});
614 		// productthumbnail.onclick()
615 		$cache.pdpMain.on("click", "img.productthumbnail", function () {
616 			var lgImg = $(this).data("lgimg");
617 
618 			// switch indicator
619 			$cache.pdpMain.find("div.product-thumbnails li.selected").removeClass("selected");
620 			$(this).closest("li").addClass("selected");
621 
622 			setMainImage(lgImg);
623 			// load zoom if not quick view
624 			if( lgImg.hires != '' && lgImg.hires.indexOf('noimagelarge')<0 ){
625 				setMainImageLink();
626 				loadZoom();
627 			} else {
628 				removeImageZoom();
629 			}
630 		});
631

672 		// swatch anchor onclick()

677 			if( el.parents('li').hasClass('unselectable') ) return;

679 			var isColor = el.closest("ul.swatches").hasClass("Color");
680 
681 			var anchor = el,
682 				qty = $cache.pdpForm.find("input[name='Quantity']").first().val(),
683 				listid = $cache.pdpForm.find("input[name='productlistid']").first().val(),
684 				productSet = $(anchor).closest('.subProduct'),
685 				params = {
686 					Quantity : isNaN(qty) ? "1" : qty
687 				};
688 			if( listid ) params.productlistid = listid;
689 
690 			var target = (productSet.length > 0 && productSet.children.length > 0) ? productSet : $cache.productContent;
691 			var url = app.util.appendParamsToUrl(this.href, params);
692 			app.progress.show($cache.pdpMain);
693 
694 			app.ajax.load({
695 				url: url,
696 				callback : function (data) {

698 					app.product.initAddThis();
699 					app.product.initAddToCart();

702 					}

704 				}
705 			});
706 		});

708 		$cache.productSetList.on("click", "div.product-set-item li a[href].swatchanchor", function (e) {
709 			e.preventDefault();
710 			// get the querystring from the anchor element
711 			var params = app.util.getQueryStringParams(this.search);
712 			var psItem = $(this).closest(".product-set-item");
713 
714 			// set quantity to value from form
715 			var qty = psItem.find("form").find("input[name='Quantity']").first().val();
716 			params.Quantity = isNaN(qty) ? "1" : qty;
717 
718 			var url = app.urls.getSetItem + "?" + $.param(params);
719 
720 			// get container
721 			var ic = $(this).closest(".product-set-item");
722 			ic.load(url, function () {
723 				app.progress.hide();
724 				if ($cache.productSetList.find("button.add-to-cart[disabled]").length>0) {
725 					$cache.addAllToCart.attr("disabled","disabled");
726 					$cache.addToCart.attr("disabled","disabled"); // this may be a bundle
727 				}
728 				else {
729 					$cache.addAllToCart.removeAttr("disabled");
730 					$cache.addToCart.removeAttr("disabled"); // this may be a bundle
731 				}
732 
733 				app.product.initAddToCart(ic);
734 				app.tooltips.init();
735 			});
736 		});
737 
738 		$cache.addAllToCart.on("click", function (e) {
739 			e.preventDefault();
740 			var psForms = $cache.productSetList.find("form").toArray(),
741 				miniCartHtml = "",
742 				addProductUrl = app.util.ajaxUrl(app.urls.addProduct);
743 
744 			// add items to cart
745 			function addItems() {
746 				var form = $(psForms.shift());
747 				var itemid = form.find("input[name='pid']").val();
748 
749 				$.ajax({
750 					dataType : "html",
751 					url: addProductUrl,
752 					data: form.serialize()
753 				})
754 				.done(function (response) {
755 					// success
756 					miniCartHtml = response;
757 				})
758 				.fail(function (xhr, textStatus) {
759 					// failed
760 					var msg = app.resources.ADD_TO_CART_FAIL;
761 					$.validator.format(msg, itemid);
762 					if(textStatus === "parsererror") {
763 						msg+="\n"+app.resources.BAD_RESPONSE;
764 					} else {
765 						msg+="\n"+app.resources.SERVER_CONNECTION_ERROR;
766 					}
767 					window.alert(msg);
768 				})
769 				.always(function () {
770 					if (psForms.length > 0) {
771 						addItems();
772 					}
773 					else {
774 						app.quickView.close();
775 						app.minicart.show(miniCartHtml);
776 					}
777 				});
778 			}
779 			addItems();
780 			return false;
781 		});
782 		app.sendToFriend.initializeDialog($cache.pdpMain, "a.send-to-friend");
783 
784 		$cache.pdpMain.find("button.add-to-cart[disabled]").attr('title', $cache.pdpMain.find(".availability-msg").html() );
785 	}
786 	/**
787 	 * @private
788 	 * @function
789 	 * @description Event handler to handle the add to cart event
790 	 */
791 	function setAddToCartHandler(e) {
792 		e.preventDefault();
793 		var form = $(this).closest("form");
794 		var qty = form.find("input[name='Quantity']");
795 		var isSubItem = $(this).hasClass("sub-product-item");
796 		if(qty.length === 0 || isNaN(qty.val()) || parseInt(qty.val(), 10) === 0) {
797 			qty.val("1");
798 		}
799 
800 		var data = form.serialize();
801 		app.cart.update(data, function (response) {
802 			var uuid = form.find("input[name='uuid']");
803 			if (uuid.length > 0 && uuid.val().length > 0) {
804 				app.cart.refresh();
805 			}
806 			else {
807 				if (!isSubItem) {
808 					app.quickView.close();
809 				}
810 				app.minicart.show(response);
811 			}
812 		});
813 	}

817 	/*************** app.product public object ***************/
818 	app.product = {
819 		init : function () {
820 			initializeCache();
821 			initializeDom();
822 			initializeEvents();
823 			loadZoom();
824 		},
825 		readReviews : function(){
826 			$('.product-tabs').tabs('select','#tab4');
827 			$('body').scrollTop($('#tab4').offset().top);
828 		},
829 		/**
830 		 * @function
831 		 * @description Loads a product into a given container div
832 		 * @param {Object} options An object with the following properties:</br>
833 		 * <p>containerId - id of the container div, if empty then global app.containerId is used</p>
834 		 * <p>source - source string e.g. search, cart etc.</p>
835 		 * <p>label - label for the add to cart button, default is Add to Cart</p>
836 		 * <p>url - url to get the product</p>
837 		 * <p>id - id of the product to get, is optional only used when url is empty</p>
838 		 */		
839 		get : function (options) {
840 			var target = options.target || app.quickView.init();
841 			var source = options.source || "";
842 			var productListID = options.productlistid || "";
843 
844 			var productUrl = options.url || app.util.appendParamToURL(app.urls.getProductUrl, "pid", options.id);
845 			if(source.length > 0) {
846 				productUrl = app.util.appendParamToURL(productUrl, "source", source);
847 			}
848 			if(productListID.length > 0) {
849 				productUrl = app.util.appendParamToURL(productUrl, "productlistid", productListID);
850 			}
851 
852 			// show small loading image
853 			//app.progress.show(app.ui.primary);
854 			app.ajax.load({
855 				target : target,
856 				url : productUrl,
857 				data : options.data || "",
858 				// replace with callback passed in by options
859 				callback : options.callback || app.product.init
860 			});
861 		},
862 		/**
863 		 * @function
864 		 * @description Gets the availability to given product and quantity
865 		 */
866 		getAvailability : function (pid, quantity, callback) {
867 			app.ajax.getJson({
868 				url: app.util.appendParamsToUrl(app.urls.getAvailability, {pid:pid, Quantity:quantity}),
869 				callback: callback
870 			});
871 		},
872 		/**
873 		 * @function
874 		 * @description Initializes the 'AddThis'-functionality for the social sharing plugin
875 		 */
876 		initAddThis : function () {
877 			var addThisServices = ["compact","facebook","myspace","google","twitter"],
878 				addThisToolbox = $(".addthis_toolbox"),
879 				addThisLinks="";
880 
881 			var i,len=addThisServices.length;
882 			for (i=0;i<len;i++) {
883 				if (addThisToolbox.find(".addthis_button_"+addThisServices[i]).length==0) {
884 					addThisLinks += '<a class="addthis_button_'+addThisServices[i]+'"></a>';
885 				}
886 			}
887 			if (addThisLinks.length===0) { return; }
888 
889 			addThisToolbox.html(addThisLinks);
890 			addthis.toolbox(".addthis_toolbox");
891 		},
892 		/**
893 		 * @function
894 		 * @description Binds the click event to a given target for the add-to-cart handling
895 		 * @param {Element} target The target on which an add to cart event-handler will be set 
896 		 */
897 		initAddToCart : function (target) {
898 			if (target) {
899 				target.on("click", ".add-to-cart", setAddToCartHandler);
900 			}
901 			else {
902 				$(".add-to-cart").on("click", setAddToCartHandler);
903 			}
904 		}
905 	};

926 	 * @private

928 	 * @description Initializes events on the product-tile for the following elements:<br/>

931 	 */
932 	function initializeEvents() {
933 		app.quickView.initializeButton($cache.container, ".product-image");
934 		$cache.container.on("mouseleave", ".swatch-list", function(e){
935 			// Restore current thumb image
936 			var tile = $(this).closest(".grid-tile");
937 			var thumb = tile.find(".product-image a.thumb-link img").filter(":first");
938 			var data = thumb.data("current");
939 			thumb.attr({
940 				src : data.src,
941 				alt : data.alt,
942 				title : data.title
943 			});
944 		});

953 			tile.find("a.name-link").attr("href", $(this).attr("href"));
954

956 			var data = swatchImg.data("thumb");
957 			var thumb = tile.find(".product-image a.thumb-link img").filter(":first");
958 			var currentAtts = {
959 				src : data.src,
960 				alt : data.alt,
961 				title : data.title
962 			};
963 			thumb.attr(currentAtts);
964 			thumb.data("current", currentAtts);
965 		}).on("mouseenter", ".swatch-list a.swatch", function (e) {
966 			//if ($(this).hasClass("selected")) { return; }
967 
968 			// get current thumb details
969 			var tile = $(this).closest(".grid-tile");
970 			var thumb = tile.find(".product-image a.thumb-link img").filter(":first");
971 			var swatchImg = $(this).children("img").filter(":first");
972 			var data = swatchImg.data("thumb");
973 			var current = thumb.data('current');
974 
975 			// If this is the first time, then record the current img
976 			if(!current) {
977 			    thumb.data('current',{src:thumb[0].src, alt:thumb[0].alt, title:thumb[0].title});
978 			}
979 
980 			// Set the tile image to the values provided on the swatch data attributes
981 			thumb.attr({
982 				src : data.src,
983 				alt : data.alt,
984 				title : data.title
985 			});
986 
987 			//swatchImg.data("thumb", currentAtts);
988 		});
989 	}

1008 /**
1009  * @class app.product.compare
1010  */
1011 (function (app, $) {
1012 	var $cache = {},
1013 		_currentCategory = "",
1014 		_isClearing = false,
1015 		MAX_ACTIVE = 6,
1016 		CI_PREFIX = "ci-";
1017 
1018 	/**
1019 	 * @private
1020 	 * @function
1021 	 * @description Verifies the number of elements in the compare container and updates it with sequential classes for ui targeting
1022 	 */
1023 	function refreshContainer() {
1024 		if (_isClearing) { return; }
1025 
1026 		var ac = $cache.compareContainer.find(".active").length;
1027 
1028 		if (ac < 2) {
1029 			$cache.compareButton.attr("disabled", "disabled");
1030 		}
1031 		else {
1032 			$cache.compareButton.removeAttr("disabled");
1033 		}
1034 
1035 		// update list with sequential classes for ui targeting
1036 		var compareItems = $cache.compareContainer.find('.compare-item');
1037 		for( i=0; i < compareItems.length; i++ ){
1038 			compareItems.removeClass('compare-item-' + i);
1039 			$(compareItems[i]).addClass('compare-item-' + i);
1040 		}
1041 
1042 		$cache.compareContainer.toggle(ac > 0);
1043 
1044 	}
1045 	/**
1046 	 * @private
1047 	 * @function
1048 	 * @description Adds an item to the compare container and refreshes it
1049 	 */
1050 	function addToList(data) {
1051 		// get the first compare-item not currently active
1052 		var item = $cache.compareContainer.find(".compare-item").not(".active").first();
1053 		if (item.length===0) { return; } // safety only
1054 
1055 		// if already added somehow, return
1056 		if ($("#"+CI_PREFIX+data.uuid).length > 0) {
1057 			return;
1058 		}
1059 		// set as active item
1060 		item.addClass("active")
1061 			.attr("id", CI_PREFIX+data.uuid)
1062 			.data("itemid", data.itemid);
1063 
1064 		// replace the item image
1065 		var itemImg = item.children("img.compareproduct").first();
1066 		itemImg.attr({src : $(data.img).attr("src"), alt : $(data.img).attr("alt")});
1067 
1068 		// refresh container state
1069 		refreshContainer();
1070 
1071 		var tile = $("#"+data.uuid);
1072 		if (tile.length===0) { return; }
1073 
1074 		// ensure that the associated checkbox is checked
1075 		tile.find(".compare-check")[0].checked = true;
1076 	}
1077 	/**
1078 	 * @private
1079 	 * @function
1080 	 * description Removes an item from the compare container and refreshes it
1081 	 */
1082 	function removeFromList(uuid) {
1083 		var item = $("#"+CI_PREFIX+uuid);
1084 		if (item.length===0) { return; }
1085 
1086 		// replace the item image
1087 		var itemImg = item.children("img.compareproduct").first();
1088 		itemImg.attr({src : app.urls.compareEmptyImage, alt : app.resources.EMPTY_IMG_ALT});
1089 
1090 		// remove class, data and id from item
1091 		item.removeClass("active")
1092 			.removeAttr("id")
1093 			.removeAttr("data-itemid")
1094 			.data("itemid", "");
1095 
1096 		// use clone to prevent image flash when removing item from list
1097 		var cloneItem = item.clone();
1098 		item.remove();
1099 		cloneItem.appendTo($cache.comparePanel);
1100 		refreshContainer();
1101 		// ensure that the associated checkbox is not checked
1102 		var tile = $("#"+uuid);
1103 		if (tile.length === 0 ) { return; }
1104 
1105 		tile.find(".compare-check")[0].checked = false;
1106 	}
1107 	/**
1108 	 * @private
1109 	 * @function
1110 	 * description Initializes the cache of compare container 
1111 	 */
1112 	function initializeCache() {
1113 		$cache = {
1114 			primaryContent : $("#primary"),
1115 			compareContainer : $("#compare-items"),
1116 			compareButton : $("#compare-items-button"),
1117 			clearButton : $("#clear-compared-items"),
1118 			comparePanel : $("#compare-items-panel")
1119 		};
1120 	}
1121 	/**
1122 	 * @private
1123 	 * @function
1124 	 * @description Initializes the DOM-Object of the compare container
1125 	 */
1126 	function initializeDom() {
1127 		_currentCategory = $cache.compareContainer.data("category") || "";
1128 		var active = $cache.compareContainer.find(".compare-item").filter(".active");
1129 		active.each(function () {
1130 			var uuid = this.id.substr(CI_PREFIX.length);
1131 			var tile = $("#"+uuid);
1132 			if (tile.length === 0 ) { return; }
1133 
1134 			tile.find(".compare-check")[0].checked = true;
1135 		});
1136 		// set container state
1137 		refreshContainer();
1138 	}
1139 	/**
1140 	 * @private
1141 	 * @function
1142 	 * @description Initializes the events on the compare container
1143 	 */
1144 	function initializeEvents() {
1145 		// add event to buttons to remove products
1146 		$cache.primaryContent.on("click", ".compare-item-remove", function (e, async) {
1147 			var item = $(this).closest(".compare-item");
1148 			var uuid = item[0].id.substr(CI_PREFIX.length);
1149 			var tile = $("#"+uuid);
1150 			var args = {
1151 				itemid : item.data("itemid"),
1152 				uuid : uuid,
1153 				cb :  tile.length===0 ? null : tile.find(".compare-check"),
1154 				async : async
1155 			};
1156 			app.product.compare.removeProduct(args);
1157 			refreshContainer();
1158 		});
1159 
1160 		// Button to go to compare page
1161 		$cache.primaryContent.on("click", "#compare-items-button", function () {
1162 			window.location.href = app.util.appendParamToURL(app.urls.compareShow, "category", _currentCategory);
1163 		});
1164 
1165 		// Button to clear all compared items
1166 		$cache.primaryContent.on("click", "#clear-compared-items", function () {
1167 			_isClearing = true;
1168 			$cache.compareContainer.hide()
1169 								   .find(".active .compare-item-remove")
1170 								   .trigger("click", [false]);
1171 			_isClearing = false;
1172 
1173 		});
1174 	}
1175 
1176 	/*************** app.product.compare public object ***************/
1177 	app.product.compare = {
1178 		/**
1179 		 * @function
1180 		 * @description Cache, events and initialization
1181 		 */		
1182 		init : function () {
1183 			initializeCache();
1184 			initializeDom();
1185 			initializeEvents();
1186 		},
1187 		initCache : initializeCache,
1188 		/**
1189 		 * @function
1190 		 * @description Adds product to the compare table
1191 		 */ 
1192 		addProduct : function (args) {
1193 			var items = $cache.compareContainer.find(".compare-item");
1194 			var cb = $(args.cb);
1195 			var ac = items.filter(".active").length;
1196 			if(ac===MAX_ACTIVE) {
1197 				if(!window.confirm(app.resources.COMPARE_CONFIRMATION)) {
1198 					cb[0].checked = false;
1199 					return;
1200 				}
1201 
1202 				// remove product using id
1203 				var item = items.first();
1204 
1205 				// safety check only. should never occur.
1206 				if (item[0].id.indexOf(CI_PREFIX)!==0) {
1207 					cb[0].checked = false;
1208 					window.alert(app.resources.COMPARE_ADD_FAIL);
1209 					return;
1210 				}
1211 				var uuid = item[0].id.substr(CI_PREFIX.length);
1212 				app.product.compare.removeProduct({
1213 					itemid: item.data("itemid"),
1214 					uuid: uuid,
1215 					cb: $("#"+uuid).find(".compare-check")
1216 				});
1217 			}
1218 
1219 			app.ajax.getJson({
1220 				url : app.urls.compareAdd,
1221 				data : { 'pid' : args.itemid, 'category' : _currentCategory },
1222 				callback : function (response) {
1223 					if (!response || !response.success) {
1224 						// response failed. uncheck the checkbox return
1225 						cb.checked = false;
1226 						window.alert(app.resources.COMPARE_ADD_FAIL);
1227 						return;
1228 					}
1229 
1230 					// item successfully stored in session, now add to list...
1231 					addToList(args);
1232 				}
1233 			});
1234 		},
1235 		/**
1236 		 * @function
1237 		 * @description Removes product from the compare table
1238 		 */	
1239 		removeProduct : function (args) {
1240 			if (!args.itemid) { return; }
1241 			var cb = args.cb ? $(args.cb) : null;
1242 			app.ajax.getJson({
1243 				url : app.urls.compareRemove,
1244 				data : { 'pid' : args.itemid, 'category' : _currentCategory },
1245 				async: args.async,
1246 				callback : function (response) {
1247 					if (!response || !response.success) {
1248 						// response failed. uncheck the checkbox return
1249 						if (cb && cb.length > 0) { cb[0].checked = true; }
1250 						window.alert(app.resources.COMPARE_REMOVE_FAIL);
1251 						return;
1252 					}
1253 
1254 					// item successfully removed session, now remove from to list...
1255 					removeFromList(args.uuid);
1256 				}
1257 			});
1258 		}
1259 	};
1260 
1261 }(window.app = window.app || {}, jQuery));

1426 /**
1427  * @class app.search
1428  */
1429 (function (app, $) {
1430 	var $cache = {};
1431 
1432 	/**
1433 	 * @private
1434 	 * @function
1435 	 * @description replaces breadcrumbs, lefthand nav and product listing with ajax and puts a loading indicator over the product listing
1436 	 */
1437 	function updateProductListing(isHashChange) {
1438 		var hash = window.location.hash;
1439 		if(hash==='#results-content' || hash==='#results-products') { return; }
1440 
1441 		var refineUrl = null;
1442 		if (hash.length > 0) {
1443 			refineUrl = window.location.pathname+"?"+hash.substr(1);
1444 		}
1445 		else if (isHashChange) {
1446 			refineUrl = window.location.href;
1447 		}
1448 
1449 		if (!refineUrl) { return; }
1450 
1451 		app.progress.show($cache.content);
1452 		$cache.main.load(app.util.appendParamToURL(refineUrl, "format", "ajax"), function () {
1453 			app.product.compare.init();
1454 			app.product.tile.init();
1455 			app.progress.hide();
1456 
1457 		});
1458 	}
1459 	/**
1460 	 * @private
1461 	 * @function
1462 	 * @description Initializes events for the following elements:<br/>
1463 	 * <p>refinement blocks</p>
1464 	 * <p>updating grid: refinements, pagination, breadcrumb</p>
1465 	 * <p>item click</p>
1466 	 * <p>sorting changes</p>
1467 	 */
1468 	function initializeEvents() {
1469 
1470 		// compare checked
1471 		$cache.main.on("click", "input[type='checkbox'].compare-check", function (e) {
1472 			var cb = $(this);
1473 			var tile = cb.closest(".product-tile");
1474 
1475 			var func = this.checked ? app.product.compare.addProduct : app.product.compare.removeProduct;
1476 			var itemImg = tile.find("div.product-image a img").first();
1477 			func({
1478 				itemid : tile.data("itemid"),
1479 				uuid : tile[0].id,
1480 				img : itemImg
1481 			});
1482 
1483 		});
1484 
1485 		// handle toggle refinement blocks
1486 		$cache.main.on("click", ".refinement h3", function (e) {
1487 			$(this)
1488 		 	.toggleClass('expanded')
1489 		 	.siblings('ul').toggle();
1490 		});
1491 
1492 		// handle events for updating grid
1493 		$cache.main.on("click", ".refinements a, .pagination a, .breadcrumb-refinement-value a", function (e) {
1494 
1495 			if($(this).parent().hasClass("unselectable")) { return; }
1496 			var catparent = $(this).parents('.category-refinement');
1497 			var folderparent = $(this).parents('.folder-refinement');
1498 			
1499 			//if the anchor tag is uunderneath a div with the class names & , prevent the double encoding of the url		
1500 			//else handle the encoding for the url		
1501 			if(catparent.length > 0 || folderparent.length > 0 ){
1502 				
1503 				return true;
1504 			}else{ 
1505 				e.preventDefault();
1506 				var uri = app.util.getUri(this);
1507 	
1508 				if( uri.query.length > 1 ) {
1509 					window.location.hash = encodeURI(decodeURIComponent(uri.query.substring(1)));
1510 				} else {
1511 					window.location.href = encodeURI(this.href);
1512 				}
1513 				return false;
1514 			}
1515 		});
1516 
1517 		// handle events item click. append params.
1518 		$cache.main.on("click", ".product-tile a:not('#quickviewbutton')", function (e) {
1519 			var a = $(this);
1520 			// get current page refinement values
1521 			var wl = window.location;
1522 
1523 			var qsParams = (wl.search.length > 1) ? app.util.getQueryStringParams(wl.search.substr(1)) : {};
1524 			var hashParams = (wl.hash.length > 1) ? app.util.getQueryStringParams(wl.hash.substr(1)) : {};
1525 
1526 			// merge hash params with querystring params
1527 			var params = $.extend(hashParams, qsParams);
1528 			if (!params.start) {
1529 				params.start = 0;
1530 			}
1531 			// get the index of the selected item and save as start parameter
1532 			var tile = a.closest(".product-tile");
1533 			var idx = tile.data("idx") ? +tile.data("idx") : 0;
1534 
1535 			// convert params.start to integer and add index
1536 			params.start=(+params.start)+(idx+1);
1537 			// set the hash and allow normal action to continue
1538 			a[0].hash = $.param(params);
1539 		});
1540 
1541 		// handle sorting change
1542 		$cache.main.on("change", ".sort-by select", function (e) {
1543 			var refineUrl = $(this).find('option:selected').val();
1544 			var uri = app.util.getUri(refineUrl);
1545 			window.location.hash = uri.query.substr(1);
1546 			return false;
1547 		})
1548 		.on("change", ".items-per-page select", function (e) {
1549 			var refineUrl = $(this).find('option:selected').val();
1550 			var uri = app.util.getUri(refineUrl);
1551 			window.location.hash = uri.query.substr(1);
1552 			return false;
1553 		});
1554 
1555 		// handle hash change
1556 		$(window).hashchange(function () {
1557 			updateProductListing(true);
1558 		});
1559 	}

1569 				app.product.compare.init();
1570 			//}

1578 /**
1579  * @class app.bonusProductsView
1580  */
1581 (function (app, $) {
1582 	var $cache = {};
1583 	var selectedList = [];
1584 	var maxItems = 1;
1585 	var bliUUID = "";
1586 	/**
1587 	 * @private
1588 	 * @function
1589 	 * description Gets a list of bonus products related to a promoted product
1590 	 */
1591 	function getBonusProducts() {
1592 		var o = {};
1593 		o.bonusproducts = [];
1594 
1595 		var i, len;
1596 		for (i=0, len=selectedList.length;i<len;i++) {
1597 			var p = { pid : selectedList[i].pid,	qty : selectedList[i].qty, options : {} };
1598 			var a, alen, bp=selectedList[i];
1599 			for (a=0,alen=bp.options.length;a<alen;a++) {
1600 				var opt = bp.options[a];
1601 				p.options = {optionName:opt.name,optionValue:opt.value};
1602 			}
1603 			o.bonusproducts.push({product:p});
1604 		}
1605 		return o;
1606 	}
1607 	/**
1608 	 * @private
1609 	 * @function
1610 	 * @description Updates the summary page with the selected bonus product
1611 	 */
1612 	function updateSummary() {
1613 		if (selectedList.length===0) {
1614 			$cache.bonusProductList.find("li.selected-bonus-item").remove();
1615 		}
1616 		else {
1617 			var ulList = $cache.bonusProductList.find("ul.selected-bonus-items").first();
1618 			var itemTemplate = ulList.children(".selected-item-template").first();
1619 			var i, len;
1620 			for (i=0, len=selectedList.length;i<len;i++) {
1621 				var item = selectedList[i];
1622 				var li = itemTemplate.clone().removeClass("selected-item-template").addClass("selected-bonus-item");
1623 				li.data("uuid", item.uuid).data("pid", item.pid);
1624 				li.find(".item-name").html(item.name);
1625 				li.find(".item-qty").html(item.qty);
1626 				var ulAtts = li.find(".item-attributes");
1627 				var attTemplate = ulAtts.children().first().clone();
1628 				ulAtts.empty();
1629 				var att;
1630 				for (att in item.attributes) {
1631 					var attLi = attTemplate.clone();
1632 					attLi.addClass(att);
1633 					attLi.children(".display-name").html(item.attributes[att].displayName);
1634 					attLi.children(".display-value").html(item.attributes[att].displayValue);
1635 					attLi.appendTo(ulAtts);
1636 				}
1637 				li.appendTo(ulList);
1638 			}
1639 			ulList.children(".selected-bonus-item").show();
1640 		}
1641 
1642 		// get remaining item count
1643 		var remain = maxItems - selectedList.length;
1644 		$cache.bonusProductList.find(".bonus-items-available").text(remain);
1645 		if (remain <= 0) {
1646 			$cache.bonusProductList.find("button.button-select-bonus").attr("disabled", "disabled");
1647 		}
1648 		else {
1649 			$cache.bonusProductList.find("button.button-select-bonus").removeAttr("disabled");
1650 		}
1651 	}

1833 				selectedList.push(product);
1834 				updateSummary();
1835 			})
1836 			.on("click", ".remove-link", function(e){
1837 				e.preventDefault();
1838 				var container = $(this).closest("li.selected-bonus-item");
1839 				if (!container.data("uuid")) { return; }
1840 
1841 				var uuid = container.data("uuid");
1842 				var i, len = selectedList.length;
1843 				for(i=0;i<len;i++) {
1844 					if (selectedList[i].uuid===uuid) {
1845 						selectedList.splice(i,1);
1846 						break;
1847 					}
1848 				}
1849 				updateSummary();
1850 			})
1851 			.on("click", ".add-to-cart-bonus", function (e) {
1852 				e.preventDefault();
1853 				var url = app.util.appendParamsToUrl(app.urls.addBonusProduct, {bonusDiscountLineItemUUID:bliUUID});
1854 				var bonusProducts = getBonusProducts();
1855 				// make the server call
1856 				$.ajax({
1857 					type : "POST",
1858 					dataType : "json",
1859 					cache	: false,
1860 					contentType : "application/json",
1861 					url : url,
1862 					data : JSON.stringify(bonusProducts)
1863 				})
1864 				.done(function (response) {
1865 					// success
1866 					app.page.refresh();
1867 				})
1868 				.fail(function (xhr, textStatus) {
1869 					// failed
1870 					if(textStatus === "parsererror") {
1871 						window.alert(app.resources.BAD_RESPONSE);
1872 					} else {
1873 						window.alert(app.resources.SERVER_CONNECTION_ERROR);
1874 					}
1875 				})
1876 				.always(function () {
1877 					$cache.bonusProduct.dialog("close");
1878 				});
1879 			});
1880 		}
1881 	};
1882 
1883 }(window.app = window.app || {}, jQuery));

1892 	function setAddToCartHandler(e) {
1893 		e.preventDefault();
1894 		var form = $(this).closest("form");
1895 
1896 		var options = {
1897 			url : app.util.ajaxUrl(form.attr('action')),
1898 			method : 'POST',
1899 			cache: false,
1900 			contentType : 'application/json',
1901 			data : form.serialize()
1902 		};
1903 		$.ajax(options).done(function (response) {
1904 			if( response.success ) {
1905 				app.ajax.load({
1906 					url : app.urls.minicartGC,
1907 					data :{lineItemId : response.result.lineItemId},
1908 					callback : function(response){
1909 						app.minicart.show(response);
1910 						form.find('input,textarea').val('');
1911 					}
1912 				});
1913 			} else {
1914 				form.find('span.error').hide();
1915 				for( id in response.errors.FormErrors ) {
1916 					var error_el = $('#'+id).addClass('error').removeClass('valid').next('.error');
1917 					if( !error_el || error_el.length===0 ) {
1918 						error_el = $('<span for="'+id+'" generated="true" class="error" style=""></span>');
1919 						$('#'+id).after(error_el);
1920 					}
1921 					error_el.text(response.errors.FormErrors[id].replace(/\\'/g,"'")).show();
1922 				}
1923 				console.log(JSON.stringify(response.errors));
1924 			}
1925 		}).fail(function (xhr, textStatus) {
1926 			// failed
1927 			if(textStatus === "parsererror") {
1928 				window.alert(app.resources.BAD_RESPONSE);
1929 			} else {
1930 				window.alert(app.resources.SERVER_CONNECTION_ERROR);
1931 			}
1932 		});
1933 	}

2026 	function selectShippingMethod(shippingMethodID) {
2027 		// nothing entered
2028 		if(!shippingMethodID) {
2029 			return;
2030 		}
2031 		// attempt to set shipping method
2032 		var url = app.util.appendParamsToUrl(app.urls.selectShippingMethodsList,
2033 											 { countryCode:$cache.countryCode.val(),
2034 											   stateCode:$cache.stateCode.val(),
2035 											   postalCode:$cache.postalCode.val(),
2036 											   city:$cache.city.val(),

2038 											 },
2039 											 true);
2040

2042 			url: url,
2043 			callback: function (data) {
2044 				updateSummary();
2045 				if(!data || !data.shippingMethodID) {

2047 					return false;
2048 				}

2052 				if(data.shippingPriceAdjustments && data.shippingPriceAdjustments.length > 0) {

2054 					for(i=0; i<len; i++) {

2062 	/**
2063 	 * @function
2064 	 * @description Make an AJAX request to the server to retrieve the list of applicable shipping methods
2065 	 * based on the merchandise in the cart and the currently entered shipping address
2066 	 * (the address may be only partially entered).  If the list of applicable shipping methods
2067 	 * has changed because new address information has been entered, then issue another AJAX
2068 	 * request which updates the currently selected shipping method (if needed) and also updates
2069 	 * the UI.
2070 	 */
2071 	function updateShippingMethodList() {
2072 		if (!$cache.shippingMethodList || $cache.shippingMethodList.length === 0) { return; }
2073 		var url = getShippingMethodURL(app.urls.shippingMethodsJSON);
2074 
2075 		 app.ajax.getJson({
2076 			url: url,
2077 			callback: function (data) {
2078 				if(!data) {
2079 					window.alert("Couldn't get list of applicable shipping methods.");
2080 					return false;
2081 				}
2082 				if (shippingMethods && shippingMethods.toString() === data.toString())
2083 				{
2084 					// No need to update the UI.  The list has not changed.
2085 					return true;
2086 				}
2087 
2088 				// We need to update the UI.  The list has changed.
2089 				// Cache the array of returned shipping methods.
2090 				shippingMethods = data;
2091 
2092 				var smlUrl = getShippingMethodURL(app.urls.shippingMethodsList);
2093 
2094 				// indicate progress
2095 				app.progress.show($cache.shippingMethodList);
2096 
2097 				// load the shipping method form
2098 				$cache.shippingMethodList.load( smlUrl, function () {
2099 					$cache.shippingMethodList.fadeIn("fast");
2100 					// rebind the radio buttons onclick function to a handler.
2101 					$cache.shippingMethodList.find("[name$='_shippingMethodID']").click(function () {
2102 						selectShippingMethod($(this).val());
2103 					});
2104 
2105 					// update the summary
2106 					updateSummary();
2107 					app.progress.hide();
2108 					app.tooltips.init();
2109 				});
2110 			}
2111 		});
2112 	}

2550 /**
2551  * @class app.util
2552  */
2553 (function (app, $) {
2554 
2555 	// sub namespace app.util.* contains utility functions
2556 	app.util = {
2557 		/**
2558 		 * @function
2559 		 * @description trims a prefix from a given string, this can be used to trim
2560 		 * a certain prefix from DOM element IDs for further processing on the ID 
2561 		 */
2562 		trimPrefix : function (str, prefix) {
2563 			return str.substring(prefix.length);
2564 		},
2565 		
2566 		/**
2567 		 * @function
2568 		 * @description 
2569 		 */
2570 		setDialogify : function (e) {
2571 			e.preventDefault();
2572 			var actionSource = $(this),
2573 				dlgAction = $(actionSource).data("dlg-action") || {}, // url, target, isForm
2574 				dlgOptions = $.extend({}, app.dialog.settings, $(actionSource).data("dlg-options") || {});
2575 
2576 			dlgOptions.title = dlgOptions.title || $(actionSource).attr("title") || "";
2577 
2578 			var url = dlgAction.url // url from data
2579 					  || (dlgAction.isForm ? $(actionSource).closest("form").attr("action") : null) // or url from form action if isForm=true
2580 					  || $(actionSource).attr("href"); // or url from href
2581 
2582 			if (!url) { return; }
2583 
2584 			var form = jQuery(this).parents('form');
2585 			var method = form.attr("method")||"POST";
2586 
2587 			// if this is a content link, update url from Page-Show to Page-Include
2588 			if ($(this).hasClass("attributecontentlink")) {
2589 				var uri = app.util.getUri(url);
2590 				url = app.urls.pageInclude+uri.query;
2591 			}
2592 			if (method && method.toUpperCase() == "POST")
2593 			{
2594 		         var postData = form.serialize() + "&"+ jQuery(this).attr("name") + "=submit";
2595 		    }
2596 			else
2597 			{
2598 		         if (url.indexOf('?') == -1 )
2599 		         {
2600 		          url+='?';
2601 		         }
2602 		         else
2603 		         {
2604 		          url += '&'
2605 		         }
2606 		         url += form.serialize();
2607 		         url = app.util.appendParamToURL(url, jQuery(this).attr('name'), "submit");
2608 			}
2609 
2610 			var dlg = app.dialog.create({target:dlgAction.target, options : dlgOptions});
2611 
2612 			app.ajax.load({
2613 				url:$(actionSource).attr("href") || $(actionSource).closest("form").attr("action"),
2614 				target:dlg, callback: function () {
2615 					dlg.dialog("open");	// open after load to ensure dialog is centered
2616 					app.validator.init(); // re-init validator
2617 				},
2618 				data : !$(actionSource).attr("href") ? postData : null
2619 
2620 			});
2621 		},
2622 		/**
2623 		 * @function
2624 		 * @description Appends a character to the left side of a numeric string (normally ' ')
2625 		 * @param {String} str the original string
2626 		 * @param {String} padChar the character which will be appended to the original string
2627 		 * @param {Number} len the length of the end string
2628 		 */
2629 		padLeft : function (str, padChar, len) {
2630 			var digs = len || 10;
2631 			var s = str.toString();
2632 			var dif = digs - s.length;
2633 			while(dif > 0) {
2634 				s = padChar + s;
2635 				dif--;
2636 			}
2637 			return s;
2638 		},
2639 		
2640 		/**
2641 		 * @function
2642 		 * @description appends the parameter with the given name and value to the given url and returns the changed url
2643 		 * @param {String} url the url to which the parameter will be added
2644 		 * @param {String} name the name of the parameter
2645 		 * @param {String} value the value of the parameter
2646 		 */
2647 		appendParamToURL : function (url, name, value) {
2648 			var c = "?";
2649 			if(url.indexOf(c) !== -1) {
2650 				c = "&";
2651 			}
2652 			return url + c + name + "=" + encodeURIComponent(value);
2653 		},
2654 		/**
2655 		 * @function
2656 		 * @description appends the parameters to the given url and returns the changed url
2657 		 * @param {String} url the url to which the parameters will be added
2658 		 * @param {String} params a JSON string with the parameters 
2659 		 */
2660 		appendParamsToUrl : function (url, params) {
2661 			var uri = app.util.getUri(url),
2662 				includeHash = arguments.length < 3 ? false : arguments[2];
2663 
2664 			var qsParams = $.extend(uri.queryParams, params);
2665 			var result = uri.path+"?"+$.param(qsParams);
2666 			if (includeHash) {
2667 				result+=uri.hash;
2668 			}
2669 			if (result.indexOf("http")<0 && result.charAt(0)!=="/") {
2670 				result="/"+result;
2671 			}
2672 
2673 			return result;
2674 		},
2675 		/**
2676 		 * @function
2677 		 * @description removes the parameter with the given name from the given url and returns the changed url
2678 		 * @param {String} url the url from which the parameter will be removed
2679 		 * @param {String} name the name of the parameter
2680 		 */
2681 		removeParamFromURL : function (url, parameter) {
2682 			var urlparts = url.split('?');
2683 
2684 			if(urlparts.length >= 2) {
2685 				var urlBase = urlparts.shift();
2686 				var queryString = urlparts.join("?");
2687 
2688 				var prefix = encodeURIComponent(parameter) + '=';
2689 				var pars = queryString.split(/[&;]/g);
2690 				var i=pars.length;
2691 				while(0 > i--) {
2692 					if(pars[i].lastIndexOf(prefix, 0) !== -1) {
2693 						pars.splice(i, 1);
2694 					}
2695 				}
2696 				url = urlBase + '?' + pars.join('&');
2697 			}
2698 			return url;
2699 		},
2700 		
2701 		/**
2702 		 * @function
2703 		 * @description Returns the static url for a specific relative path 
2704 		 * @param {String} path the relative path
2705 		 */
2706 		staticUrl : function (path) {
2707 			if(!path || $.trim(path).length === 0) {
2708 				return app.urls.staticPath;
2709 			}
2710 
2711 			return app.urls.staticPath + (path.charAt(0) === "/" ? path.substr(1) : path );
2712 		},
2713 		/**
2714 		 * @function
2715 		 * @description Appends the parameter 'format=ajax' to a given path   
2716 		 * @param {String} path the relative path
2717 		 */
2718 		ajaxUrl : function (path) {
2719 			return app.util.appendParamToURL(path, "format", "ajax");
2720 		},
2721 		
2722 		/**
2723 		 * @function
2724 		 * @description 
2725 		 * @param {String} url
2726 		 */
2727 		toAbsoluteUrl : function (url) {
2728 			if (url.indexOf("http")!==0 && url.charAt(0)!=="/") {
2729 				url = "/"+url;
2730 			}
2731 			return url;
2732 		},
2733 		/**
2734 		 * @function
2735 		 * @description Loads css dynamically from given urls
2736 		 * @param {Array} urls Array of urls from which css will be dynamically loaded.   
2737 		 */
2738 		loadDynamicCss : function (urls) {
2739 			var i, len=urls.length;
2740 			for(i=0; i < len; i++) {
2741 				app.util.loadedCssFiles.push(app.util.loadCssFile(urls[i]));
2742 			}
2743 		},
2744 
2745 		/**
2746 		 * @function
2747 		 * @description Loads css file dynamically from given url
2748 		 * @param {String} url The url from which css file will be dynamically loaded.   
2749 		 */
2750 		loadCssFile : function (url) {
2751 			return $("<link/>").appendTo($("head")).attr({
2752 				type : "text/css",
2753 				rel : "stylesheet"
2754 			}).attr("href", url); // for i.e. <9, href must be added after link has been appended to head
2755 		},
2756 		// array to keep track of the dynamically loaded CSS files
2757 		loadedCssFiles : [],
2758 
2759 		/**
2760 		 * @function
2761 		 * @description Removes all css files which were dynamically loaded   
2762 		 */
2763 		clearDynamicCss : function () {
2764 			var i = app.util.loadedCssFiles.length;
2765 			while(0 > i--) {
2766 				$(app.util.loadedCssFiles[i]).remove();
2767 			}
2768 			app.util.loadedCssFiles = [];
2769 		},
2770 		/**
2771 		 * @function
2772 		 * @description Extracts all parameters from a given query string into an object
2773 		 * @param {String} qs The query string from which the parameters will be extracted
2774 		 */
2775 		getQueryStringParams : function (qs) {
2776 			if(!qs || qs.length === 0) { return {}; }
2777 
2778 			var params = {}, unescapedQS = unescape(qs);
2779 			// Use the String::replace method to iterate over each
2780 			// name-value pair in the string.
2781 			unescapedQS.replace( new RegExp( "([^?=&]+)(=([^&]*))?", "g" ),
2782 						function ( $0, $1, $2, $3 ) {	params[ $1 ] = $3; }
2783 			);
2784 			return params;
2785 		},
2786 		/**
2787 		 * @function
2788 		 * @description Returns an URI-Object from a given element with the following properties:<br/>
2789 		 * <p>protocol</p>
2790 		 * <p>host</p>
2791 		 * <p>hostname</p>
2792 		 * <p>port</p>
2793 		 * <p>path</p>
2794 		 * <p>query</p>
2795 		 * <p>queryParams</p>
2796 		 * <p>hash</p>
2797 		 * <p>url</p>
2798 		 * <p>urlWithQuery</p>
2799 		 * @param {Object} o The HTML-Element
2800 		 */
2801 		getUri : function (o) {
2802 			var a;
2803 			if (o.tagName && $(o).attr("href")) {
2804 				a = o;
2805 			}
2806 			else if (typeof o === "string") {
2807 				a = document.createElement("a");
2808 				a.href = o;
2809 			}
2810 			else {
2811 				return null;
2812 			}
2813 
2814 			return {
2815 				protocol : a.protocol, //http:
2816 				host : a.host, //www.myexample.com
2817 				hostname : a.hostname, //www.myexample.com'
2818 				port : a.port, //:80
2819 				path : a.pathname, // /sub1/sub2
2820 				query : a.search, // ?param1=val1¶m2=val2
2821 				queryParams : a.search.length > 1 ? app.util.getQueryStringParams(a.search.substr(1)) : {},
2822 				hash : a.hash, // #OU812,5150
2823 				url : a.protocol+ "//" + a.host + a.pathname,
2824 				urlWithQuery : a.protocol+ "//" + a.host + a.port + a.pathname + a.search
2825 			};
2826 		},
2827 		/**
2828 		 * @function
2829 		 * @description Appends a form-element with given arguments to a body-element and submits it
2830 		 * @param {Object} args The arguments which will be attached to the form-element:<br/>
2831 		 * <p>url</p>
2832 		 * <p>fields - an Object containing the query-string parameters</p>   
2833 		 */
2834 		postForm : function (args) {
2835 			var form = $("<form>").attr({action:args.url,method:"post"}).appendTo("body");
2836 			var p;
2837 			for (p in args.fields) {
2838 				$("<input>").attr({name:p,value:args.fields[p]}).appendTo(form);
2839 			}
2840 			form.submit();
2841 		},
2842 		/**
2843 		 * @function
2844 		 * @description  Returns a JSON-Structure of a specific key-value pair from a given resource bundle
2845 		 * @param {String} key The key in a given Resource bundle
2846 		 * @param {String} bundleName The resource bundle name 
2847 		 * @param {Object} A callback function to be called 
2848 		 */
2849 		getMessage : function (key, bundleName, callback) {
2850 			if (!callback || !key || key.length===0) {
2851 				return;
2852 			}
2853 			var params = {key:key};
2854 			if (bundleName && bundleName.length===0) {
2855 				params.bn = bundleName;
2856 			}
2857 			var url = app.util.appendParamsToUrl(app.urls.appResources, params);
2858 			$.getJSON(url, callback);
2859 		},
2860 		/**
2861 		 * @function
2862 		 * @description Updates the states options to a given country
2863 		 * @param {String} countrySelect The selected country
2864 		 */
2865 		updateStateOptions : function(countrySelect) {
2866 			var country = $(countrySelect);
2867 			if (country.length===0 || !app.countries[country.val()]) {
2868 				 return;
2869 			}
2870 			var form = country.closest("form");
2871 			var stateField = country.data("stateField") ? country.data("stateField") : form.find("select[name$='_state']");
2872 			if (stateField.length===0) {
2873 				return;
2874 			}
2875 
2876 			var form = country.closest("form"),
2877 				c = app.countries[country.val()],
2878 				arrHtml = [],
2879 				labelSpan = form.find("label[for='"+stateField[0].id+"'] span").not(".required-indicator");
2880 
2881 			// set the label text
2882 			labelSpan.html(c.label);
2883 
2884 			var s;
2885 			for (s in c.regions) {
2886 				arrHtml.push('<option value="'+s+'">'+c.regions[s]+'</option>');
2887 			}
2888 			// clone the empty option item and add to stateSelect
2889 			var o1 = stateField.children().first().clone();
2890 			stateField.html(arrHtml.join("")).removeAttr("disabled").children().first().before(o1);
2891 			stateField[0].selectedIndex=0;
2892 		},
2893 		/**
2894 		 * @function
2895 		 * @description Updates the number of the remaining character 
2896 		 * based on the character limit in a text area  
2897 		 */
2898 		limitCharacters : function () {
2899 			$('form').find('textarea[data-character-limit]').each(function(){
2900 				var characterLimit = $(this).data("character-limit");
2901 				var charCountHtml = String.format(app.resources.CHAR_LIMIT_MSG,
2902 										'<span class="char-remain-count">'+characterLimit+'</span>',
2903 										'<span class="char-allowed-count">'+characterLimit+'</span>');
2904 				var charCountContainer = $(this).next('div.char-count');
2905 				if (charCountContainer.length===0) {
2906 					charCountContainer = $('<div class="char-count"/>').insertAfter($(this));
2907 				}
2908 				charCountContainer.html(charCountHtml);
2909 				// trigger the keydown event so that any existing character data is calculated
2910 				$(this).change();
2911 			});
2912 		},
2913 		/**
2914 		 * @function
2915 		 * @description Binds the onclick-event to a delete button on a given container, 
2916 		 * which opens a confirmation box with a given message

2959 /**
2960  * @class app.registry
2961  */
2962 (function (app, $) {
2963 	var $cache = {};
2964 	/**
2965 	 * @function
2966 	 * @description Loads address details to a given address and fills the "Pre-Event-Shipping" address form
2967 	 * @param {String} addressID The ID of the address to which data will be loaded
2968 	 */
2969 	function populateBeforeAddressForm(addressID) {
2970 		// load address details
2971 		var url = app.urls.giftRegAdd + addressID;
2972 		 app.ajax.getJson({
2973 			url: url,
2974 			callback: function (data) {
2975 				if(!data || !data.address) {
2976 					window.alert(app.resources.REG_ADDR_ERROR);
2977 					return false;
2978 				}
2979 				// fill the form
2980 				$cache.addressBeforeFields.filter("[name$='_addressid']").val(data.address.ID);
2981 				$cache.addressBeforeFields.filter("[name$='_firstname']").val(data.address.firstName);

3382 					if (data.status.toLowerCase()==="ok") {

3813 /**
3814  * @class app.validator
3815  */
3816 (function (app, $) {
3817 
3818 	var naPhone = /^\(?([2-9][0-8][0-9])\)?[\-\. ]?([2-9][0-9]{2})[\-\. ]?([0-9]{4})(\s*x[0-9]+)?$/,
3819 		regex = {
3820 			phone : {
3821 				us : naPhone,
3822 				ca : naPhone
3823 			},
3824 			postal : {
3825 				us : /^\d{5}(-\d{4})?$/,
3826 				ca : /^[ABCEGHJKLMNPRSTVXY]{1}\d{1}[A-Z]{1} *\d{1}[A-Z]{1}\d{1}$/,
3827 				gb : /^GIR?0AA|[A-PR-UWYZ]([0-9]{1,2}|([A-HK-Y][0-9]|[A-HK-Y][0-9]([0-9]|[ABEHMNPRV-Y]))|[0-9][A-HJKS-UW])?[0-9][ABD-HJLNP-UW-Z]{2}$/
3828 			},
3829 			email : /^[\w.%+\-]+@[\w.\-]+\.[\w]{2,6}$/
3830 		},
3831 		settings = {
3832 			// global form validator settings
3833 			errorClass : 'error',
3834 			errorElement : 'span',
3835 			onkeyup : false,
3836 			onfocusout : function (element) {
3837 				if(!this.checkable(element)) {
3838 					this.element(element);
3839 				}
3840 			}
3841 		};
3842 	/**
3843 	 * @function
3844 	 * @description Validates a given phone number against the countries phone regex
3845 	 * @param {String} value The phone number which will be validated
3846 	 * @param {String} el The input field
3847 	 */
3848 	function validatePhone(value, el) {
3849 		var country = $(el).closest("form").find(".country");
3850 		if(country.length === 0 || country.val().length === 0 || !regex.phone[country.val().toLowerCase()]) {
3851 			return true;
3852 		}
3853 
3854 		var rgx = regex.phone[country.val().toLowerCase()];
3855 		var isOptional = this.optional(el);
3856 		var isValid = rgx.test($.trim(value));
3857 
3858 		return isOptional || isValid;
3859 	}
3860 	/**
3861 	 * @function
3862 	 * @description Validates a given email
3863 	 * @param {String} value The email which will be validated
3864 	 * @param {String} el The input field
3865 	 */
3866 	function validateEmail(value, el) {
3867 		var isOptional = this.optional(el);
3868 		var isValid = regex.email.test($.trim(value));
3869 		return isOptional || isValid;
3870 	}
3871 
3872 	/**
3873 	 * Add phone validation method to jQuery validation plugin.
3874 	 * Text fields must have 'phone' css class to be validated as phone
3875 	 */
3876 	$.validator.addMethod("phone", validatePhone, app.resources.INVALID_PHONE);
3877 
3878 	/**
3879 	 * Add email validation method to jQuery validation plugin.
3880 	 * Text fields must have 'email' css class to be validated as email
3881 	 */
3882 	$.validator.addMethod("email", validateEmail, app.resources.INVALID_EMAIL);
3883 
3884 	/**
3885 	 * Add gift cert amount validation method to jQuery validation plugin.
3886 	 * Text fields must have 'gift-cert-amont' css class to be validated
3887 	 */
3888 	$.validator.addMethod("gift-cert-amount", function(value, el){
3889 		var isOptional = this.optional(el);
3890 		var isValid = (!isNaN(value)) && (parseFloat(value)>=5) && (parseFloat(value)<=5000);
3891 		return isOptional || isValid;
3892 	}, app.resources.GIFT_CERT_AMOUNT_INVALID);
3893 
3894 	/**
3895 	 * Add positive number validation method to jQuery validation plugin.
3896 	 * Text fields must have 'positivenumber' css class to be validated as positivenumber
3897 	 */
3898 	$.validator.addMethod("positivenumber", function (value, element) {
3899 		if($.trim(value).length === 0) { return true; }
3900 		return (!isNaN(value) && Number(value) >= 0);
3901 	}, "");
3902 	// "" should be replaced with error message if needed
3903 
3904 	$.validator.messages.required = function ($1, ele, $3) {
3905 		var requiredText = $(ele).parents('.form-row').attr('data-required-text');
3906 		return requiredText||"";
3907 	};

3926 /**
3927  * @class app.ajax
3928  */
3929 (function (app, $) {
3930 
3931 	var currentRequests = [];
3932 	// request cache
3933 
3934 	// sub namespace app.ajax.* contains application specific ajax components
3935 	app.ajax = {
3936 		/**
3937 		 * @function
3938 		 * @description Ajax request to get json response
3939 		 * @param {Boolean} async  Asynchronous or not
3940 		 * @param {String} url URI for the request
3941 		 * @param {Object} data Name/Value pair data request
3942 		 * @param {Function} callback  Callback function to be called
3943 		 */	
3944 		getJson : function (options) {
3945 			options.url = app.util.toAbsoluteUrl(options.url);
3946 			// return if no url exists or url matches a current request
3947 			if(!options.url || currentRequests[options.url]) {
3948 				return;
3949 			}
3950 
3951 			currentRequests[options.url] = true;
3952 
3953 			// make the server call
3954 			$.ajax({
3955 				dataType : "json",
3956 				url : options.url,
3957 				async : (typeof options.async==="undefined" || options.async===null) ? true : options.async,
3958 				data : options.data || {}
3959 			})
3960 			// success
3961 			.done(function (response) {
3962 				if(options.callback) {
3963 					options.callback(response);
3964 				}
3965 			})
3966 			// failed
3967 			.fail(function (xhr, textStatus) {
3968 				if(textStatus === "parsererror") {
3969 					window.alert(app.resources.BAD_RESPONSE);
3970 				}
3971 				if(options.callback) {
3972 					options.callback(null);
3973 				}
3974 			})
3975 			// executed on success or fail
3976 			.always(function () {
3977 				// remove current request from hash
3978 				if(currentRequests[options.url]) {
3979 					delete currentRequests[options.url];
3980 				}
3981 			});
3982 		},
3983 		/**
3984 		 * @function
3985 		 * @description ajax request to load html response in a given container
3986 		 * @param {String} url URI for the request
3987 		 * @param {Object} data Name/Value pair data request
3988 		 * @param {Function} callback  Callback function to be called
3989 		 * @param {Object} target Selector or element that will receive content
3990 		 */	
3991 		load : function (options) {
3992 			options.url = app.util.toAbsoluteUrl(options.url);
3993 			// return if no url exists or url matches a current request
3994 			if(!options.url || currentRequests[options.url]) {
3995 				return;
3996 			}
3997 
3998 			currentRequests[options.url] = true;
3999 
4000 			// make the server call
4001 			$.ajax({
4002 				dataType : "html",
4003 				url : app.util.appendParamToURL(options.url, "format", "ajax"),
4004 				data : options.data
4005 			})
4006 			.done(function (response) {
4007 				// success
4008 				if(options.target) {
4009 					$(options.target).empty().html(response);
4010 				}
4011 				if(options.callback) {
4012 					options.callback(response);
4013 				}
4014 
4015 			})
4016 			.fail(function (xhr, textStatus) {
4017 				// failed
4018 				if(textStatus === "parsererror") {
4019 					window.alert(app.resources.BAD_RESPONSE);
4020 				}
4021 				options.callback(null, textStatus);
4022 			})
4023 			.always(function () {
4024 				app.progress.hide();
4025 				// remove current request from hash
4026 				if(currentRequests[options.url]) {
4027 					delete currentRequests[options.url];
4028 				}
4029 			});
4030 		}
4031 	};
4032 }(window.app = window.app || {}, jQuery));

4034 /**
4035  * @class app.searchsuggest
4036  */
4037 (function (app, $) {
4038 	var qlen = 0,
4039 		listTotal = -1,
4040 		listCurrent = -1,
4041 		delay = 300,
4042 		fieldDefault = null,
4043 		suggestionsJson = null,
4044 		$searchForm,
4045 		$searchField,
4046 		$searchContainer,
4047 		$resultsContainer;
4048 	/**
4049 	 * @function
4050 	 * @description Handles keyboard's arrow keys
4051 	 * @param keyCode Code of an arrow key to be handled
4052 	 */
4053 	function handleArrowKeys(keyCode) {
4054 		switch (keyCode) {
4055 			case 38:
4056 				// keyUp
4057 				listCurrent = (listCurrent <= 0) ? (listTotal - 1) : (listCurrent - 1);
4058 				break;
4059 			case 40:
4060 				// keyDown
4061 				listCurrent = (listCurrent >= listTotal - 1) ? 0 : listCurrent + 1;
4062 				break;
4063 			default:
4064 				// reset
4065 				listCurrent = -1;
4066 				return false;
4067 		}
4068 
4069 		$resultsContainer.children().removeClass("selected").eq(listCurrent).addClass("selected");
4070 		$searchField.val($resultsContainer.find(".selected div.suggestionterm").first().text());
4071 		return true;
4072 	}
4073 
4074 	/******* app.searchsuggest public object ********/
4075 	app.searchsuggest = {
4076 		/**
4077 		 * @function
4078 		 * @description Configures parameters and required object instances
4079 		 */	
4080 		init : function (container, defaultValue) {
4081 			// initialize vars
4082 			$searchContainer = $(container);
4083 			$searchForm = $searchContainer.find("form[name='simpleSearch']");
4084 			$searchField = $searchForm.find("input[name='q']");
4085 			fieldDefault = defaultValue;
4086 
4087 			// disable browser auto complete
4088 			$searchField.attr("autocomplete", "off");
4089 
4090 			// on focus listener (clear default value)
4091 			$searchField.focus(function () {
4092 				if(!$resultsContainer) {
4093 					// create results container if needed
4094 					$resultsContainer = $("<div/>").attr("id", "suggestions").appendTo($searchContainer).css({
4095 						"top" : $searchContainer[0].offsetHeight,
4096 						"left" : 0,
4097 						"width" : $searchField[0].offsetWidth
4098 					});
4099 				}
4100 				if($searchField.val() === fieldDefault) {
4101 					$searchField.val("");
4102 				}
4103 			});
4104 			// on blur listener
4105 			$searchField.blur(function () {
4106 				setTimeout(app.searchsuggest.clearResults, 200);
4107 			});
4108 			// on key up listener
4109 			$searchField.keyup(function (e) {
4110 
4111 				// get keyCode (window.event is for IE)
4112 				var keyCode = e.keyCode || window.event.keyCode;
4113 
4114 				// check and treat up and down arrows
4115 				if(handleArrowKeys(keyCode)) {
4116 					return;
4117 				}
4118 				// check for an ENTER or ESC
4119 				if(keyCode === 13 || keyCode === 27) {
4120 					app.searchsuggest.clearResults();
4121 					return;
4122 				}
4123 
4124 				var lastVal = $searchField.val();
4125 
4126 				// if is text, call with delay
4127 				setTimeout(function () { app.searchsuggest.suggest(lastVal); }, delay);
4128 			});
4129 			// on submit we do not submit the form, but change the window location
4130 			// in order to avoid https to http warnings in the browser
4131 			// only if it's not the default value and it's not empty
4132 			$searchForm.submit(function (e) {
4133 				e.preventDefault();
4134 				var searchTerm = $searchField.val();
4135 				if(searchTerm === fieldDefault || searchTerm.length === 0) {
4136 					return false;
4137 				}
4138 				window.location = app.util.appendParamToURL($(this).attr("action"), "q", searchTerm);
4139 			});
4140 		},
4141 		
4142 		/**
4143 		 * @function
4144 		 * @description trigger suggest action
4145 		 * @param lastValue
4146 		 */
4147 		suggest : function (lastValue) {
4148 			// get the field value
4149 			var part = $searchField.val();
4150 
4151 			// if it's empty clear the resuts box and return
4152 			if(part.length === 0) {
4153 				app.searchsuggest.clearResults();
4154 				return;
4155 			}
4156 
4157 			// if part is not equal to the value from the initiated call,
4158 			// or there were no results in the last call and the query length
4159 			// is longer than the last query length, return
4160 			// #TODO: improve this to look at the query value and length
4161 			if((lastValue !== part) || (listTotal === 0 && part.length > qlen)) {
4162 				return;
4163 			}
4164 			qlen = part.length;
4165 
4166 			// build the request url
4167 			var reqUrl = app.util.appendParamToURL(app.urls.searchsuggest, "q", part);
4168 
4169 			// get remote data as JSON
4170 			$.getJSON(reqUrl, function (data) {
4171 				// get the total of results
4172 				var suggestions = data,
4173 					ansLength = suggestions.length,
4174 					listTotal = ansLength;
4175 
4176 				// if there are results populate the results div
4177 				if(ansLength === 0) {
4178 					app.searchsuggest.clearResults();
4179 					return;
4180 				}
4181 				suggestionsJson = suggestions;
4182 				var html = "";
4183 				var i, len=ansLength;
4184 				for(i=0; i < len; i++) {
4185 					html+='<div><div class="suggestionterm">'+suggestions[i].suggestion+'</div><span class="hits">'+suggestions[i].hits+'</span></div>';
4186 				}
4187 
4188 				// update the results div
4189 				$resultsContainer.html(html).show().on("hover", "div", function () {
4190 					$(this).toggleClass = "selected";
4191 				}).on("click", "div", function () {
4192 					// on click copy suggestion to search field, hide the list and submit the search
4193 					$searchField.val($(this).children(".suggestionterm").text());
4194 					app.searchsuggest.clearResults();
4195 					$searchForm.trigger("submit");
4196 				});
4197 			});
4198 		},
4199 		/**
4200 		 * @function
4201 		 * @description 
4202 		 */		
4203 		clearResults : function () {
4204 			if (!$resultsContainer) { return; }
4205 			$resultsContainer.empty().hide();
4206 		}
4207 	};
4208 }(window.app = window.app || {}, jQuery));

4210 /**
4211  * @class app.searchplaceholder
4212  */
4213 (function (app, $) {
4214 	/**
4215 	 * @private
4216 	 * @function
4217 	 * @description Binds event to the place holder (.blur) 
4218 	 */
4219 	function initializeEvents() {
4220 		$('#q').focus(function () {
4221 			var input = $(this);
4222 			if (input.val() === input.attr("placeholder")) {
4223 				input.val("");
4224 			}
4225 		})
4226 		.blur(function () {
4227 			var input = $(this);
4228 			if (input.val() === "" || input.val() === input.attr("placeholder")) {
4229 				input.val(input.attr("placeholder"));
4230 			}
4231 		})
4232 		.blur();
4233 	}
4234 	
4235 	/******* app.searchplaceholder public object ********/
4236 	app.searchplaceholder = {
4237 		/**
4238 		 * @function
4239 		 * @description Binds event to the place holder (.blur) 
4240 		 */		
4241 		init : function () {
4242 			initializeEvents();
4243 		}
4244 	};
4245 }(window.app = window.app || {}, jQuery));

4247 // jquery extensions
4248 (function ($) {
4249 	// params
4250 	// toggleClass - required
4251 	// triggerSelector - optional. the selector for the element that triggers the event handler. defaults to the child elements of the list.
4252 	// eventName - optional. defaults to 'click'
4253 	$.fn.toggledList = function (options) {
4254 		if (!options.toggleClass) { return this; }
4255 
4256 		var list = this;
4257 		function handleToggle(e) {
4258 			e.preventDefault();
4259 			var classTarget = options.triggerSelector ? $(this).parent() : $(this);
4260 			classTarget.toggleClass(options.toggleClass);
4261 			// execute callback if exists
4262 			if (options.callback) { options.callback(); }
4263 		}
4264 
4265 		return list.on(options.eventName || "click", options.triggerSelector || list.children(), handleToggle);
4266 	};
4267 
4268 	$.fn.syncHeight = function () {
4269 		function sortHeight(a, b) {
4270 			return $(a).height() - $(b).height();
4271 		}
4272 
4273 		var arr = $.makeArray(this);
4274 		arr.sort(sortHeight);
4275 		return this.height($(arr[arr.length-1]).height());
4276 	};
4277 }(jQuery));

4280 (function () {
4281 	String.format = function() {
4282 		var s = arguments[0];
4283 		var i,len=arguments.length - 1;
4284 		for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
4285 			var reg = new RegExp("\\{" + i + "\\}", "gm");
4286 			s = s.replace(reg, arguments[i + 1]);
4287 		}
4288 		return s;
4289 	};
4290 })();
